com.cieolib.cieolib

Class HitAnimation

  • Object
    • HitAnimation

  • public class HitAnimation
extends Object
    This animation will occur on the 'bullet' itself.
    Author:
    Novikov Igor

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int NONE
      No Hit Animation.
      static int SHAKE_HORIZONTAL
      After the 'bullet' will hit, it will "shake" horizontally.
      static int SHAKE_HORIZONTAL_CUSTOM
      Custom HitAnimation "shake" horizontally.
      static int SHAKE_VERTICAL
      After the 'bullet' will hit, it will "shake" vertically.
      static int SHAKE_VERTICAL_CUSTOM
      Custom HitAnimation "shake" vertically.

    • Field Detail

      • NONE

        public static final int NONE
        No Hit Animation.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SHAKE_HORIZONTAL

        public static final int SHAKE_HORIZONTAL
        After the 'bullet' will hit, it will "shake" horizontally. Predefined settings:
        Number of pixels to move - 1 Duration (speed) - 70 Number of repeats - 0
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SHAKE_HORIZONTAL_CUSTOM

        public static final int SHAKE_HORIZONTAL_CUSTOM
        Custom HitAnimation "shake" horizontally. Pass array of int for HitAnimation settings:
        array[0] = Number of pixels to move.
        array[1] = Duration (speed).
        array[2] = Number of repeats.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SHAKE_VERTICAL_CUSTOM

        public static final int SHAKE_VERTICAL_CUSTOM
        Custom HitAnimation "shake" vertically. Pass array of int for HitAnimation settings:
        array[0] = Number of pixels to move.
        array[1] = Duration (speed).
        array[2] = Number of repeats.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SHAKE_VERTICAL

        public static final int SHAKE_VERTICAL
        After the 'bullet' will hit, it will "shake" vertically. Predefined settings:
        Number of pixels to move - 1 Duration (speed) - 70 Number of repeats - 0
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
